name: direnv
description: Installs direnv from distro repository or GitHub release and adds it to the global PATH.

version.description: The specific version to install; default value is 'latest' which will install the most recent available in distro repo or GitHub release. NOTE: If a version is provided and a matching distro package/GitHub Release can not be found the feature will fail.

installFromGitHubRelease.description: When true, force pulling releases directly from published GitHub Release regardless of the default installation method.
